title: Turn the Constant into log
text: Use the definition of logarithm, we can get $$3=\log_{4}\left(64\right)$$ since $$4^3=64$$.

title: Match Bases
text: With all terms containing same log base, the log can be removed, so it becomes $$x^2=64$$. Solve for x and get $$x=-8$$ or $$x=8$$.

title: Check for Constrains
text: Given $$\log_{a}\left(b\right)$$, b cannot be negative. We can omit the negative answer and get $$x=8$$ as the only solution for the equation.
